column1: Come on. Come on, little fella. 'Atta boy.
Right over here.  Good dog. Come on.  There you go, right in there.  Goooood dog.

It just makes me sick how some people can treat animals.  Well, nothing we can do for it; let's put it to sleep, shall we?  Here you go, pup. I've got a sweet dose of murder for you.  What the? Blasted! He's escaped! ...Oh well, let's murder one of these other dogs.
